column4: I have a quick question, since I dont know how to do it. I'm trying to change it to where I boot up nongui and only run gui if I type startx. Only thing I've been able to try is to change the runlevel to 3 but it doesnt change anything. I really dont know what I'm doing.
changing runlevel won't work, since *buntu uses 2-5 the same way
sry no idea then. ask those clever guys who forced the use of upstart :(
